translation.en: Hey, stranger.
It's not what it looks like.
It is, but I can explain--
-Ow! [gasps] -[figure whispering] I know…
[woman 1] No.
No! No!
[woman 1] The power to fly. That's what you dream of.
There's no better feeling.
The truth is, you only fly for a second or two
translation.es: La realidad es que solo vuelas uno o dos segundos

translation.en: before gravity takes back what you tried to steal.
translation.es: antes de que la gravedad recupere lo suyo.

translation.en: Because no matter how hard you work, how strong you are, or how thin you get…
translation.es: No importa cuánto te esfuerces ni cuán fuerte o delgado seas…

translation.en: gravity always, always wins.
[woman 2] Neveah. Neveah!
Chicago called.
They said they didn't want me.
Something changed their mind.
What happened?
I wish I knew.
Hey.
Good luck in there.
[woman 3] The Archer School of Ballet has bolstered its security protocols,
translation.es: En la Escuela Archer de Ballet, reforzamos la seguridad,

translation.en: offered counseling to all students,
and put the focus squarely back where it should be,
translation.es: y nos volvimos a concentrar en lo importante:

translation.en: training the next generation of world-class dancers.
translation.es: formar a la próxima generación de los mejores bailarines.

translation.en: There are reports of angry parents, donors pulling out.
translation.es: Hay padres contribuyentes muy enojados que dejarán la escuela.

translation.en: One star student sadly suffered a fateful misstep.
translation.es: Lamentablemente, una alumna estrella dio un fatídico traspié.

translation.en: "Misstep"? She fell four stories…
[woman 1] Of course, for any dancer, the higher you fly,
translation.es: Para cualquier bailarín, cuanto más alto vueles,

translation.en: the more bone-shattering the landing that inevitably arrives.
translation.es: más dura será la caída que inevitablemente llega.

translation.en: You have to be quick on your feet to adapt and deal with the unexpected.
translation.es: Debes recuperarte rápido para lidiar con lo inesperado.

translation.en: And in time,
you learn two tricks that help you survive when there's trouble in the spotlight.
translation.es: aprendes dos trucos que te ayudarán con los problemas.

translation.en: First, you never lose your smile.
translation.es: Primero: no perder la sonrisa jamás.

translation.en: And second,
you make damn sure you distract them with something else to look at.
translation.es: asegurarse de que se distraigan con otra cosa.

translation.en: [woman 4] Madame DuBois.
[gasps] Monique DuBois! Oh, my gosh!
Welcome to the Archer School of Ballet.
translation.es: Bienvenida a la Escuela Archer de Ballet.

translation.en: Our newest arrival, here on a full-ride scholarship.
translation.es: Nuestra más reciente alumna, con un beca completa.

translation.en: We helped a girl escape her dead-end life in Compton.
translation.es: La ayudamos a dejar una vida sin futuro en Compton.

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -Inglewood, actually, but--
Oh, well, when we see talent, we don't ask where it comes from.
translation.es: Cuando vemos talento, no preguntamos de dónde viene.

translation.en: Dancers here have trained since they could walk. Up for the late arrival?
translation.es: Todos aquí bailan desde niños. ¿Estarás a la altura?

translation.en: With a girl of Neveah's talent, two years here will prime her for success.
translation.es: Con el talento que tiene, en dos años estará lista para triunfar.

translation.en: Dancing in Cassie Shore's footsteps.
translation.es: Y bailará en lugar de Cassie Shore.

translation.en: Who's Cassie Shore?
We have a tired young lady here. [chuckles]
-Be in touch for a photo release. -[Monique chuckles] Thank you so much.
translation.es: Llámenos por las fotografías. Muchas gracias.

translation.en: That went over like a lead balloon.
-Was there something I was-- -Yes, but for now, get her to Alan.
translation.es: ¿Fue algo que…? Sí. Ahora llévala con Alan.

translation.en: [Cassie] They start with your bones, then your feet, frame, and flexibility.
translation.es: Empiezan por los huesos. Siguen con los pies, la contextura y la flexibilidad.

translation.en: Your musicality, charisma, and deference.
Then after they've taken you apart…
they wanna see a spark.
It's so we can check your alignment,
see how your turnout is regressing.
translation.es: para ver cómo avanza tu rotación.

translation.en: You sure she'll do the trick?
[Monique] It's a start.
I'm also announcing the premiere of a new ballet by Ramon Costa.
translation.es: Y anunciaré el estreno de un ballet de Ramon Costa.

translation.en: Ramon Costa? But we don't have him.
translation.es: ¿Ramon Costa? Pero si no lo tenemos.

translation.en: Yet.
Neveah, there's a photo of your dad on file. What about your mother?
translation.es: Neveah, en el expediente, hay una foto de tu padre. ¿Y tu madre?

translation.en: What about her?
We predict how you'll develop from the--
I know, but you already accepted me.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero ya me dejaron entrar.

translation.en: This Cassie Shore, what went down?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasó con esta tal Cassie Shore?

translation.en: There was an accident.
So she's gone, and that's why I'm here?
You're here, Neveah, because you have something special.
translation.es: Neveah, estás aquí porque tienes algo especial.

translation.en: Now go out there and make sure they see it.
Okay, so you're tier three, ages 16 and 17.
translation.es: El tercer piso es el de las chicas de 16 y 17 años.

translation.en: Doors lock at curfew, and all guests sign in.
translation.es: Adentro a la hora límite. Las visitas se registran.

translation.en: Academics are from eight to noon. You missed today, but I got your homework.
translation.es: Las clases teóricas son de 8:00 a 12:00. Tengo tu tarea de hoy.

translation.en: And then dance is from 1:00 to 6:30.
translation.es: Las clases de danza son de 1:00 a 6:30.

translation.en: Lights out at ten. Honey.
translation.es: Se apagan las luces a las 10:00. Cariño…

translation.en: [taps on door] Here's home.
Your roommate's name is June.
You drink or smoke, you're out. You fail your academics, you're gone.
translation.es: Quedas expulsada si bebes o fumas, si repruebas,

translation.en: You get too skinny, you're sent home.
You get caught screwing a boy, or a girl, for that matter, bye-bye.
translation.es: si te encuentran acostándote con un chico… o una chica.

translation.en: Basically, just act like I'm watching everything, because I am.
translation.es: En fin, compórtate como si te vigilara porque lo haré.

translation.en: Toodles.
Thanks.
Did she say one? Oh, shit.
[man] All right, everyone, let's get started.
-Facing the barre in sixth, please. -You're in my spot.
translation.es: De frente a la barra, en sexta posición. Es mi lugar.

translation.en: [man] Pressing over to three-quarter pointe plié. Right, left.
translation.es: Bajan a plié. Media punta alta. Derecha, izquierda.

translation.en: Rolling through the feet.
-And reverse. -Sorry, that's mine.
Rise, test your balance.
Open to first.
-Repeat in second. -And anywhere but there.
And finish with a four-count side bend, right, left.
translation.es: Terminan con un cambré a cada lado en cuatro tiempos.

translation.en: -And a nice, full rond de corps… -Everyone's got their place.
translation.es: - Y un rond de corps… - Todos tienen su lugar.

translation.en: [man] Yes! Let's have a waltz, please. Thank you, Richard.
translation.es: Vamos con un vals. Gracias, Richard.

translation.en: And…
-[man] Relax the ankles in the demi. -You're in the sticks, darling.
translation.es: Relajen los tobillos en el demi-plié. Derecho de piso.

translation.en: [man] Keep the heels together as you roll through.
And demi.
And double.
And lengthen into the grand…
Present the heel in the tendu devant, people!
translation.es: Quiero ver el talón en el tendu devant.

translation.en: Humor me, please! People, close the ribs!
I need to see the fifth.
Make your transitions precise.
Your weight over your supporting leg does not mean slouching.
translation.es: No dejen de crecer por tener el peso en la pierna de apoyo.

translation.en: -We don't wear junk here. -Junk?
Junk. You've covered what I need to see.
translation.es: Esa ropa. Tapas lo que necesito ver.

translation.en: Lift in the attitude.
You're sinking in your port de bras. Sternum up.
translation.es: Te hundes en el port de bras. Sube el esternón.

translation.en: Drop that hip.
Nope, your hip's still up to your ear.
translation.es: No, tienes la cadera en la oreja.

translation.en: Your weight's in your heels.
You need to be over your supporting leg.
translation.es: Debes estar en la pierna de apoyo.

translation.en: Drop your hip.
Lift.
Bette, demonstrate to the side.
-[piano music fades] -Look. Do you see?
Okay, I'll spare you.
Just visiting?
New admission.
Then show up next class in proper attire with better shoes.
translation.es: La próxima clase, ven con ropa y zapatillas adecuadas.

translation.en: Those are a fiasco.
Bette, your second arm is late.
Your second arm is late.
No. Try a higher passé.
-[piano music fades] -Another year, and still not a turner.
translation.es: Otro año, y sigues sin poder girar.

translation.en: Your summer break did you no favors.
So, tomorrow after class, we'll begin pas de deux.
translation.es: Mañana, después de clase, empezaremos con el pas de deux.

translation.en: But this term, each of you will be assigned just one partner.
translation.es: Este trimestre, cada uno tendrá un único compañero.

translation.en: Trust in this building has been broken,
translation.es: Se rompió la confianza en esta escuela,

translation.en: and this may help rebuild it.
[quietly] Wow. He's amazing!
Yeah, if you're hot for psychos.
translation.es: Sí, si te gustan los locos.

translation.en: You ask me, he pushed her.
Nabil, very good.
Pushed who?
His girlfriend, Cassie.
Pinch whatever you need to and get busy.
translation.es: Elige las que quieras y empieza.

translation.en: This is every shoe that ballerinas at City Works rejected,
translation.es: Son las zapatillas que rechazaron en City Works.

translation.en: yours for a few bucks.
You did pretty good today.
[scoffs] Are you kidding? I could not get on my leg.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No podía subirme a la pierna.

translation.en: We've all been there.
You think this place can make me company-ready in two years?
translation.es: ¿Estaré lista para la compañía en dos años?

translation.en: I've seen them do more with less.
But if they're wrong, you're gone.
I'm sorry, we haven't met.
Bette. This is June.
Show me your arches.
-What, my feet? -[June] That won't make a dancer.
Where'd you train?
Bette's just scoping the competish.
Scared.
Anyone who got in this late must be fierce prima material.
translation.es: Si entraste tan tarde, eres una posible primera bailarina.

translation.en: All right, pretty good. [sighs]
Friends. [chuckles]
Neveah, these would be perfect for you.
Double X, high vamp?
What is…
Are these Delia Whitlaw's shoes?
Well, her rejects.
[boy] They look like a perfect fit.
-Isn't that interesting, Bette? -You're trash, Shane.
translation.es: Interesante, ¿no, Bette? Púdrete, Shane. Diviértete hurgando con tu Petite Rat.

translation.en: Have fun scavenging with your new petit rat.
translation.es: Púdrete, Shane. Diviértete hurgando con tu Petite Rat.

translation.en: [June] Bye.
-Did she just call me a-- -[Shane] A rat, yep.
But like everything in ballet, it sounds better in French.
translation.es: Como todo en ballet, suena mejor en francés.

translation.en: A little rat's a dancer who's young, pretty, poor, and hella strong.
translation.es: Una ratita es una bailarina sin experiencia, linda, pobre… y muy fuerte.

translation.en: And this one here wears the shoes of Delia fricking Whitlaw.
translation.es: Y esta rata de aquí usa las zapatillas de Delia Whitlaw.

translation.en: It's crazy.
I only applied to the Archer because it's where she went.
translation.es: Quería venir aquí porque ella es exalumna.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
Then let's get you a front-row seat.
-[grunts] -Easy, man.
-Hey. -[grunts] What the fuck!
You're good.
I'm not good. I had another one in me.
Blowing out a pec ain't gonna help with your dancing.
translation.es: Lastimarte un pectoral no te ayudará.

translation.en: You heard Brooks. I'm out of shape.
translation.es: Oíste a Brooks. No estoy en forma.

translation.en: [grunts] Guaranteed he wasn't talking about you.
translation.es: Te aseguro que no hablaba de ti.

translation.en: [boy] Caleb, check it out. Second time that cop's talked to him.
translation.es: Caleb, es la segunda vez que habla con esa policía.

translation.en: She must smell blood.
You tell her anything?
[exhales] Oren, we all stuck to the same story.
translation.es: Oren, todos nos ceñimos a la misma versión.

translation.en: Cassie was alone. We weren't there.
translation.es: Cassie estaba sola. No estábamos ahí.

translation.en: You sure impressed Brooks today.
Not really.
A little rusty.
Must suck, coming all this way to be with your girlfriend…
translation.es: Debe de ser horrible venir hasta aquí para estar con tu novia…

translation.en: and then she goes and falls off the fucking building.
translation.es: y que ella se caiga del edificio.

translation.en: I came here to study dance.
Chicago made an offer I cannot refuse.
[Oren] I was watching you.
I know.
You don't have the American style.
That's true.
I'm more than tits and teeth.
translation.es: Soy más que una cara bonita.

translation.en: I watched you too.
You're banal, safe.
translation.es: Eres banal, vas a lo seguro.

translation.en: Safe till you showed up.
translation.es: Ella estaba segura hasta que viniste.

translation.en: And then… [whistles]
Splat.
And now the cops.
I tell her how Cassie told me how you would drop her.
translation.es: Ya sabe que dejabas caer a Cassie

translation.en: Perhaps sabotage--
[Oren] I was the best partner she ever had!
-[Nabil] Gotta show me respect. -Hey, guys, break it up!
You don't belong here.
-Oh, my God. -I have goose bumps, look.
translation.es: - Por Dios. - Mira, tengo piel de gallina.

translation.en: Do you know, I've seen, like, a hundred videos of her?
translation.es: He visto unos cien videos de ella.

translation.en: City Works is lucky to get her back.
translation.es: City Works tiene suerte de tenerla.

translation.en: After rocking it in Europe last year, she could write her own ticket.
translation.es: Le fue genial en Europa, podría hacer lo que quisiera.

translation.en: [man] Don't be dragged by the tempi. Anticipate.
Oh, she's a goddess.
[man] All right. Let this section travel more.
[Shane sighs] So good.
Footwork needs refining. [Delia] I'm giving it all I've got, Ramon.
translation.es: - Hay que pulir el trabajo de pies. - Lo doy todo, Ramon.

translation.en: There's no room for me in the choreography.
translation.es: La coreografía no es para mí.

translation.en: [Ramon] You're dancing from here.
But I need to see it here.
And when the night comes…
here.
The piece is in you.
I'm only drawing it out. Come on.
Touch an audience the same way that you would touch me.
translation.es: Toca al público como si me tocaras a mí.

translation.en: Come on, girl, tear off his shirt.
[Delia] Like this?
If it's something you can use.
Let's go.
[Shane] Well, that's no fun.
[Cassie] Always, something hurts.
Somewhere on your body, there's pain,
translation.es: En algún lugar del cuerpo, hay dolor,

translation.en: an ache that comes from pushing beyond what any person was ever meant to do.
translation.es: un malestar que surge por ir más allá de lo que uno debía hacer.

translation.en: But there's strength in being part of a larger body.
translation.es: Pero ser parte de algo mayor te fortalece.

translation.en: [girl laughs] Please.
[Cassie] The corps de ballet.
-[giggling] -[June] Well, she's certainly got style.
[Bette] Yeah, for a pole dancer.
translation.es: Sí, para el baile del caño.

translation.en: -That there isn't even ballet. -[hip-hop music playing]
Guys.
Found your little dance show.
Very cute.
At least somebody here actually likes to dance.
translation.es: Al menos a alguien le gusta bailar.

translation.en: That what this is for you?
Playtime?
You just told me I was good enough to be your friend.
translation.es: Dijiste que era buena para ser tu amiga.

translation.en: It wasn't because you were good, Petit Rat.
translation.es: No lo dije porque fueras buena, Petite Rat,

translation.en: It's because I was better.
I get that I'm late to the party,
and I get that I might ruin your little plan to be the next queen bee around here,
translation.es: y que quizás arruine tus planes de ser la próxima estrella,

translation.en: but I got up in here fair and square, and you best believe
translation.es: pero me gané mi lugar de forma justa

translation.en: I'm coming for you.
Miss Stroyer, Madame DuBois wants to see you.
Now.
Relax, officer. It's cortisone.
If I could just speak to a few more students--
I spoke to your sergeant. The case is closed.
translation.es: Ya hablé con su superior. El caso está cerrado.

translation.en: Yet a beat cop is here exploiting an awful accident,
translation.es: Aun así, usted está aquí explotando un accidente

translation.en: traumatizing my students, for what?
translation.es: y traumatizando a mis alumnos. ¿Con qué fin?

translation.en: You can't tell me you're satisfied.
[Monique] You can't tell me you're getting anywhere.
You've had a week to find one iota of foul play,
translation.es: Tuvo una semana para hallar un ápice de juego sucio.

translation.en: but it all adds up to a tragic fall.
translation.es: Todo sugiere que fue una caída trágica.

translation.en: Piercing this takes time. Every institution has its secrets.
translation.es: Esto lleva tiempo. Toda institución tiene secretos.

translation.en: Before the police, you were in the army?
God knows what you did there, officer, but ballet is no place for redemption.
translation.es: Solo Dios sabe qué hizo allí, pero el ballet no es lugar para la redención.

translation.en: I found her.
We were just wrapping up.
Settling in, I hope. Dégagez, officer.
translation.es: - Espero que te estés adaptando. - Dégagez, oficial.

translation.en: You wanted to see me?
[Monique] You're to attend tonight's donor reception.
translation.es: Hoy asistirás a la gala para contribuyentes.

translation.en: A driver will fetch you with the others,
and Selena can help you find something presentable in the costume department.
translation.es: y Selena te buscará algo presentable en Vestuario.

translation.en: -I have my own clothes. -Of course you do.
But ballet demands a certain--
-Merde! -Oh! Apologies, Madame.
That was bone you hit.
We are about to invest thousands of dollars in you,
translation.es: Vamos a invertir miles de dólares en ti

translation.en: and we need to know that in two years' time, you will be a product…
translation.es: y debemos saber si, dentro de dos años, serás un producto…

translation.en: -Product? -…that we can make use of.
You're either the ASB's future or a bad gamble.
translation.es: O eres el futuro de la escuela o una mala inversión.

translation.en: Our key donors will be asking themselves that very question tonight.
translation.es: Nuestros mayores contribuyentes se harán esa pregunta esta noche.

translation.en: On these cards is the story you'll want to tell.
translation.es: Estas tarjetas contienen la historia que contarás.

translation.en: Madame DuBois, I'm just here to dance.
translation.es: Madame DuBois, yo vine para bailar.

translation.en: Wrong. Tonight decides your future as much as anything you do in class.
translation.es: Te equivocas. Esta noche afectará tu futuro tanto como tu desempeño.

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a price you pay learning to fly.
translation.es: Se paga un precio por aprender a volar.

translation.en: They steal your childhood, your family…
translation.es: Te roban la niñez, a tu familia…

translation.en: -Hey. -…leave you only with friends
translation.es: Hola. …y te dejan con amigos que desean que te lesiones.

translation.en: who hope every day that your Achilles will snap.
translation.es: …y te dejan con amigos que desean que te lesiones.

translation.en: And they never let you grow up.
[Cassie] So if you wanna live a little…
you gotta get creative.
[sighs] God, I need this.
I was thinking we should get ourselves cast as partners.
translation.es: Deberíamos hacer que nos elijan como compañeros.

translation.en: -[Bette] Huh? -We'd dominate.
Word is, I'm getting paired with Nabil.
So we fight it.
[scoffs] I don't want to rock the boat.
Aw, jeez.
-[exhales] -You think Frenchie's better than me.
translation.es: Crees que el francesito es mejor.

translation.en: And you don't want to be stuck tossing around the new girl.
translation.es: Tú no querrás aguantar a la chica nueva.

translation.en: We can all fake a lot of things onstage.
translation.es: Podemos fingir muchas cosas en el escenario,

translation.en: -But we can't fake love. -Oh, yeah. I can.
translation.es: pero no amor. Sí. Yo sí puedo.

translation.en: -No candles. -[taps on door]
-[panting] Someone's coming. -[grunts]
Oh, well, I guess it's not gonna be me.
translation.es: Supongo que hoy no es mi día.

translation.en: Oh, I just gotta work out this cramp. Brooks had us do push-ups after barre.
translation.es: Estoy acalambrado. Hoy hicimos muchas lagartijas.

translation.en: Honey, I don't care if you broke a bone. If Bette's in there, the door is open.
translation.es: No me importa si te fracturaste. Abre ya si Bette está ahí.

translation.en: Except they're busy.
Fighting.
I don't hear it.
The silent treatment phase. Brutal.
translation.es: No se hablan. Es muy cruel.

translation.en: Yeah. Do you want to see brutal?
-No. -No.
Oh, hey, Torri.
You know the rules.
Did the door blow shut? I hadn't noticed. Oren, did you notice?
translation.es: ¿Se cerró la puerta? No me había dado cuenta. ¿Y tú, Oren?

translation.en: -Was deep into the causes of the Cold War. -[Torri] Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Estaba absorto en la Guerra Fría.

translation.en: Actually, Torri, I'm glad you came by. You know I'm attending that event later?
translation.es: ¿Sabes, Torri? Qué bueno que viniste. ¿Recuerdas la gala?

translation.en: I have this lovely, bejeweled cocktail mini,
but the tulle's a little fuzzy, so I'll need use of an iron.
translation.es: pero el tul está arrugado. Necesito plancharlo.

translation.en: -[exhales] -I'm done playing this game.
Hey, I owe you one.
Why didn't I just borrow one of theirs?
That looks nice.
I'm so not ready for this.
Okay, let me have a look at what I have.
Yeah.
You just need a little extra zhuzh.
Or… like that.
That looks chic. And the other girls, they're just jealous.
translation.es: Es elegante. Las chicas te tienen envidia.

translation.en: Of what?
You saw how the ballet master was going at me.
translation.es: Viste cómo me criticó el maestro.

translation.en: Wrong this, wrong that.
At least he was paying you attention.
He never gives me a single correction.
translation.es: A mí nunca me hace correcciones.

translation.en: -Maybe you're already good enough. -It's ballet. Nobody's good enough.
translation.es: - Quizá no las necesites. - Siempre las necesitas en ballet.

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a twisted bargain to ballet.
translation.es: El ballet ofrece un trato perverso.

translation.en: After all your hard work, your pain and sacrifice,
translation.es: Tras todo el esfuerzo, el dolor y el sacrificio,

translation.en: when you walk among mortals,
you become a god.
You're a perfect, worshipped fruition of the best the body can do.
translation.es: Eres el fruto perfecto y venerado de lo mejor que el cuerpo puede ofrecer.

translation.en: [photographer] Fantastic. Thank you. Can we get a quick candid with you?
Yeah, together. All right, big smiles, now.
Love it. Fantastic suit.
-♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
translation.es: DESCONOCIDO: AUNQUE ME IGNORES, EL MUNDO SABRÁ LO QUE HICISTE.

translation.en: -♪ Or are you man enough for me? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough for me? ♪
-♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
And after this past week, I have to admit
translation.es: Luego de esta última semana, debo admitir

translation.en: that it turns out not all press is good press.
translation.es: que no toda la prensa es buena prensa.

translation.en: [Monique] But thanks to you here, this school is stronger than ever.
translation.es: Gracias a ustedes, la escuela está más sólida que nunca.

translation.en: Inspired by your faith and generosity,
translation.es: Inspirados por su fe y su generosidad,

translation.en: the school will be creating a new ballet
in Cassie's honor,
by renowned choreographer Ramon Costa.
translation.es: creado por el reconocido coreógrafo Ramon Costa.

translation.en: -[crowd gasps] -You gotta be kidding me.
The ballet world will soon have its eye on the school for the right reasons.
translation.es: Pronto, la escuela estará en la mira del mundo del ballet por el motivo correcto.

translation.en: To a bright future.
[man] Yeah, cheers! Bright future!
This had better work.
Yes, and we appreciate the support from enthusiasts like you.
translation.es: Sí, y valoramos el apoyo de entusiastas como tú.

translation.en: I'm worth a lot more than a fat check.
translation.es: Valgo mucho más que un cheque abultado.

translation.en: Leave the Archer to its director.
translation.es: Deja que la directora se ocupe.

translation.en: Let's just hope the crisis isn't beyond you.
translation.es: Espero que puedas manejar la crisis.

translation.en: Hello again.
Hey there.
So I hear they call you the wrench?
With a name like Alan, it kind of fits.
translation.es: Me llamo Alan. Llave Allen, ¿te suena?

translation.en: How was your first day?
They kind of threw me in the deep end.
You've got a decent arch and open hips, and around here, that'll get you far.
translation.es: Tienes un arco decente y buena rotación. Con eso, llegarás lejos.

translation.en: Tell it to that sadistic jackass.
The way he rolls? You have no idea.
translation.es: Ni te imaginas el estilo que tiene.

translation.en: Oh, I do. Topher Brooks is my husband.
translation.es: Sí, me lo imagino. Topher Brooks es mi marido.

translation.en: Well…
better mingle. [exhales]
I'm not doing it, Monique.
Once I set this new piece at City Works, I'm back to Paris.
translation.es: Volveré a París cuando termine con City Works.

translation.en: To choreograph another art wank?
Ramon, I'm offering you a safe place to work out big ideas,
translation.es: Ramon, te ofrezco un lugar para desarrollar ideas ambiciosas con artistas talentosos.

translation.en: get a jump on talent.
He's got all the talent he needs.
[Monique] It would show loyalty to the school,
translation.es: Le serías leal a la escuela

translation.en: which means loyalty to the professional company we build dancers for.
translation.es: y también a la compañía profesional para la que formamos bailarines.

translation.en: City Works Ballet will commission a full-length work next year.
translation.es: El City Works Ballet encargará un trabajo extenso el año próximo.

translation.en: If you work with us, I'll push for you to get that gig.
translation.es: Si trabajas con nosotros, presionaré para que lo consigas.

translation.en: I know you're desperate to tell a new story, Monique…
translation.es: Estás desesperada por contar una historia nueva…

translation.en: but I'm long past being your boy toy.
translation.es: pero ya dejé de ser tu títere.

translation.en: Darling, there's cheese on that.
Trust me, Mother, I earned it today.
I'm glad to hear. Oren, what a delight.
translation.es: Me alegro. Qué gusto verte, Oren.

translation.en: -Mrs. Whitlaw. Thanks for having us. -[kisses]
I swear we host these jamborees just to clap eyes on our girls.
translation.es: Hacemos estas reuniones para observar a nuestras chicas.

translation.en: I hope we'll all be seeing lots of you two this season, onstage and off.
translation.es: Ojalá los veamos a ustedes juntos en el escenario y fuera de él.

translation.en: I hope so too.
Tell us.
Is this a star pairing or what?
translation.es: ¿Este no es un dúo destinado a triunfar?

translation.en: Partners have already been finalized.
I'm sure you'll do the right thing.
I always do, Katrina.
Mom, you can't boss around my ballet master!
translation.es: ¡Mamá! No puedes darle órdenes a mi maestro de ballet.

translation.en: I wouldn't dream of it.
Now, let's get you in front of Ramon Costa.
translation.es: Ven, que Ramon Costa te vea.

translation.en: Where's that shawl that goes with that dress?
translation.es: ¿Y el chal que va con ese vestido?

translation.en: I didn't need it tonight.
Those bony shoulders are turning heads. You're not eating enough.
translation.es: Tus hombros huesudos llaman la atención. Comes muy poco.

translation.en: I'm fine, Mom, and I'm glad to see you.
translation.es: Estoy bien, mamá. Y me alegra verte.

translation.en: Well, I had a flight back to New York tonight.
But some things are more important.
Exactly. What happened to Cassie reminds us all, life's short.
translation.es: Sí. El incidente de Cassie nos recuerda que la vida es corta.

translation.en: What's your role?
My role?
Your part in the ballet showcase.
Oh. Well, with the accident, they've delayed any casting announcements.
translation.es: Retrasaron los anuncios por el accidente.

translation.en: Bloody artists, can't keep their schedule.
It's The Sleeping Beauty this year, which is perfect for me.
translation.es: Haremos La bella durmiente, y es perfecto para mí.

translation.en: Everybody says I'm guaranteed to dance Aurora now.
translation.es: Todos dicen que yo haré el papel de Aurora.

translation.en: -Why can't you believe in me? -[mother] I do.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no crees en mí? - Sí creo.

translation.en: I'm just not paying through the teeth
so you can get a rubbish education and no future.
translation.es: por una mala educación sin futuro.

translation.en: I get it. You want a doctor, a lawyer, a senator.
translation.es: Entiendo. Quieres que sea médica, abogada o senadora.

translation.en: Mom, I just want to dance.
So dance… in your bedroom, in the shower.
translation.es: Y baila, pero en el cuarto, en la ducha.

translation.en: Go prance at your prom like every other teenage girl.
translation.es: En tu graduación, como cualquier adolescente.

translation.en: But I did not raise my only child to prop up the scenery.
translation.es: No crié a mi hija para que sea parte del decorado.

translation.en: You're either on track to make principal dancer or you're out.
translation.es: Si no estás cerca de ser primera bailarina, te irás.

translation.en: Mom!
I'm on track.
Look, I'll get a lead role, and every artistic director will want me
translation.es: Tendré un papel principal y todos los directores me querrán

translation.en: because Cassie won't be stealing my spotlight.
translation.es: porque Cassie no me robará el protagonismo.

translation.en: She didn't steal it, June. She's better than you.
translation.es: No te lo robó, June. Es mejor que tú.

translation.en: She's not better than me now.
translation.es: No es mejor que yo ahora.

translation.en: Now, that's my girl.
What do you think is one of the factors that gave you the cutting edge to get you where you are today?
translation.es: ¿Cuáles crees que son los factores que te ayudaron a llegar adonde estás?

translation.en: I think it was the gymnastics that helped me advance so quickly
translation.es: Creo que la gimnasia me ayudó a avanzar rápido

translation.en: when I started ballet.
And the hip-hop stuff I do, it's kind of--
I saw some videos online.
There's a wonderful power to them.
-[camera shutters click] -It's just me messing around.
The girls here diss them big time.
translation.es: Las chicas de aquí los menosprecian.

translation.en: I mean, I've seen some rough stuff back home, but nothing compared to this shit.
translation.es: Vi cosas duras en mi ciudad, pero nada se compara con esta basura.

translation.en: Yes, what I think Neveah would like to emphasize
translation.es: Sí, a Neveah le gustaría remarcar

translation.en: is how the ASB is about the f--
translation.es: que la escuela se trata de…

translation.en: Fundamentals. Yes.
In which I am in great need of.
I have raw talent, but that needs shaping if I want a career in ballet.
translation.es: Tengo talento, pero hay que pulirlo si quiero ser profesional.

translation.en: And for that, the Archer School is the best place.
translation.es: Y la Escuela Archer es el mejor lugar para eso.

translation.en: Well, thank you, Neveah. And good luck.
-[Monique] Thank you. -[reporter] Thank you.
You had a script.
I also had a life.
Why are you here slumming with the students?
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces aquí con el alumnado? - Como Ramon venía…

translation.en: -I figured if Ramon was coming-- -Smart.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces aquí con el alumnado? - Como Ramon venía… Qué lista.

translation.en: -Keep an eye on him. -Hmm.
Ramon Costa, may I present my daughter Bette?
translation.es: Ramon Costa, le presento a mi hija Bette.

translation.en: ASB's next star graduate.
He's already working with a graduate.
We're not potato chips, Delia.
-You can have more than one. -[phone beeps]
Mr. Costa, I hope you have a chance to watch me in class tomorrow.
translation.es: ESTÁS ACABADO. Ojalá pueda verme en clase.

translation.en: I'm not in the habit of viewing students.
Too bad. You might be surprised.
-[camera shutter clicks] -[laughs] Thank you so much.
translation.es: - Perfecto. - Gracias. Fue un gusto verte.

translation.en: It's so good to see you. Thank you, Zandara.
translation.es: - Perfecto. - Gracias. Fue un gusto verte. Gracias, Zandara.

translation.en: -Just gotta say, huge fan. -You're very kind.
translation.es: Debo decir que te admiro mucho. Qué dulce.

translation.en: Neveah Stroyer. It's my first day here.
Yes, I saw Monique parading you around.
Yeah. I'm not sure I landed my jumps, you know what I mean?
translation.es: Me parece que no hice bien lo que debía.

translation.en: You kick high and smile, she'll love you.
translation.es: Si levantas las piernas y sonríes, te amará.

translation.en: This one wears your shoes.
My what? Your pointe shoes.
Crams her little bunions into them like she's Cinderella.
Actually, Cinderella's foot fits perfect--
translation.es: De hecho, a Cenicienta le calzaba perfecto…

translation.en: Bette, have you been drinking?
-Did no one here get told fairy tales? -We were too busy living them.
translation.es: - ¿No les contaban cuentos de hadas? - Los vivíamos.

translation.en: This isn't your world, little rat. Knowing the steps doesn't mean you belong.
translation.es: No perteneces aquí. No alcanza con saber los pasos.

translation.en: Well, someone here must think I do.
-You don't get it, do you? -Bette, quit it.
The only reason Monique let you in
was to give the school a shiny, new distraction after stupid Cassie bled out on the street.
translation.es: para que todos se olvidaran de que la tonta de Cassie se desangró.

translation.en: But you're even stupider. You can't see they're using you.
translation.es: Tú eres más tonta aún. No ves que te usan.

translation.en: You'd just rather stand here star-fucking my sister.
translation.es: Prefieres quedarte adulando a mi hermana.

translation.en: Sister?
Neveah, if you're here, you're good.
translation.es: Neveah, si estás aquí, es porque eres buena.

translation.en: Just wanted to let you know I landed.
You're doing that thing you do when you're trying not to cry.
-I don't have a thing I do. -Hell yeah, you do.
You know, for a star dancer, your muscle control sucks.
translation.es: Aunque bailes, tu control muscular es pésimo.

translation.en: And so does my situation here.
I need money. I'll pay you back, I promise.
translation.es: Necesito dinero. Prometo que te lo devolveré.

translation.en: -You're not coming home. -It's not working!
translation.es: - No volverás a casa. - Esto no funciona.

translation.en: They got me playing some crazy-ass script that's not even me.
translation.es: Me obligaron a seguir un guion que no me representa.

translation.en: You did it. You got out.
What for, Ty?
I came here to dance,
to do the one thing in my crazy-ass life that I can hold onto,
translation.es: a hacer lo único que puedo mantener en mi vida de locos,

translation.en: and they don't care about that.
So what?
I don't fit in.
Well, halle-fucking-lujah! What dancer wants to?
Nevie, you're never getting this chance again,
so you take everything you can from those freaks,
translation.es: así que aprende todo lo que puedas

translation.en: and when you're done, stratosphere.
translation.es: y, cuando termines, saldrás a triunfar.

translation.en: Stratosphere, baby.
[Nabil] Neveah.
Nabil, hey.
If you need someone else to say you are a good dancer…
translation.es: Si necesitas que te digan que eres buena bailando…

translation.en: …you aren't.
But when you don't look like you jumped out of the music box--
translation.es: Tú no pareces salido de la caja de música.

translation.en: -[Nabil] It's not how we look. -I see who these ballet companies hire,
translation.es: - No es por la apariencia. - Sé a quiénes contratan.

translation.en: and most of the time, it's not us.
translation.es: Y no suelen contratarnos a nosotros.

translation.en: [Shane] Ow, fuck me!
-[grunts] -[Nabil] Hey, Shane.
-The party's over. -[Shane] Party is only starting, Nabil.
translation.es: - La fiesta terminó. - No, está empezando, Nabil.

translation.en: We're just warming up.
Now the old farts are tucking in, we're getting busy.
translation.es: Los viejos se van, y empieza la diversión.

translation.en: I heard what you were saying about not fitting the mold.
translation.es: Oí lo que dijiste, que no encajas.

translation.en: That's a good thing, and it always has been.
translation.es: Es algo bueno. Siempre lo ha sido.

translation.en: So if you ever want proof that dancers like you have been around forever…
translation.es: Si quieres pruebas de que siempre ha habido bailarinas como tú…

translation.en: …say the word. I'll show you some.
Go open the gate and let in the masses!
June!
Hey. June Park, isn't it?
-Officer Cruz? -Yeah.
You're out late.
My mother's in town.
Oh, that's nice. Little support these days.
translation.es: Viene bien un poco de apoyo estos días.

translation.en: After all, you were Cassie's roommate, weren't you?
Yeah.
Must be hard for you, lying in your bed, staring at her empty one,
translation.es: Debe de ser duro tener una cama vacía al lado

translation.en: asking yourself, "What the hell happened?"
Isn't your investigation over?
Officially, yeah, but I…
I lost someone…
not that long ago, and I can't shake it.
translation.es: hace poco y no puedo superarlo.

translation.en: Bet you can't either.
They all say she slipped.
You ask me, she jumped.
Then how'd she land on her back?
Maybe she wasn't interested in admiring the view on the way down.
translation.es: No le interesaría la vista al caer.

translation.en: No history of depression, no note.
translation.es: No tenía depresión ni dejó una nota.

translation.en: Who'd read it?
We all admired Cassie, but we didn't much like her.
translation.es: Todos admirábamos a Cassie, pero no nos caía muy bien.

translation.en: A raft of rivals.
-And this. -[cell phone beeps]
I took this on the roof today. See that? Those are scuff marks.
translation.es: La tomé en la azotea. ¿Ves eso? Son rozaduras.

translation.en: Someone was backing away. They were trying to get free of something.
translation.es: Alguien retrocedió. Tal vez para liberarse.

translation.en: Are-- are you saying Cassie was pushed?
I'm not saying anything.
Look. I don't know a nutcracker from my nightstick,
translation.es: Yo no entiendo mucho de ballet,

translation.en: but I know danger when I see it.
Folks at your school might keep getting hurt unless we shine a light.
translation.es: Si no esclarecemos esto, otros podrían salir lastimados.

translation.en: Here's my card.
There's rules, officer.
And I'm not the one around here to break them.
translation.es: Y yo no seré quien las rompa.

translation.en: [Cassie] All day, someone else controls what you eat,
what you wear, how you move, and who you touch.
translation.es: cómo te vistes, cómo te mueves y a quién tocas.

translation.en: You're strapped into the roller coaster with your fiercest competitors.
translation.es: Estás en una montaña rusa con tus rivales más feroces.

translation.en: But what nobody else sees
is those rivals are also the only people who get you…
translation.es: es que esos rivales son los únicos que te entienden…

translation.en: who celebrate you for who you are and challenge you to do better.
translation.es: son los que celebran quién eres y te desafían a mejorar.

translation.en: There's no other way to say it.
translation.es: No hay otro modo de decirlo.

translation.en: They're your tribe.
Hey. You know I don't go there.
translation.es: Oye. Sabes que no hago eso.

translation.en: Except I kind of do.
We're just helping each other out here.
I know, not like this means anything.
translation.es: Ya sé. Esto no significa nada.

translation.en: How'd you get your V-cut like that?
How about we use our anatomy, not talk about it?
Seriously, though… what's your secret?
Don't know, I just dance.
I worked all summer on my external obliques trying to carve out a set,
translation.es: Ejercité todo el verano mis abdominales oblicuos,

translation.en: and I can't get your results.
-Lucky me. -Hmm.
If you go to the gym, I should-- Oh, my God.
translation.es: Si vas al gimnasio, yo… Dios.

translation.en: I didn't see you.
Nobody does.
[Neveah] Delia.
Dropping off the trash, all for you.
translation.es: Saco la basura. Es toda para ti.

translation.en: How do I know if I'm the right fit?
You just keep your neck long,
your hips small,
your arches high.
[June] And bone.
-They want to see bone. -[bones cracking]
June, stop!
-[whimpering] -You need help!
Help!
-[gasps] -[Delia] The only way out is up.
[Neveah] Mom! Mom!
Mom! Mom!
Mom!
[panting] Cassie.
You should never have come.
No!
Pathetic.
You're shit.
Here to steal my secrets?
No, thanks. I got my own.
translation.es: No, gracias. Ya tengo los míos.

translation.en: Bet you do.
[Neveah] You're thinking about it too much.
Trying to show how hard you're working, like that gets you points or something?
translation.es: ¿Crees que mostrar cuánto te esfuerzas te dará puntos?

translation.en: Except nobody wants to see you sweat.
I've had the country's top teacher--
And look where that got you.
You know you want to say something, so just say it.
translation.es: Ya di lo que quieres decir.

translation.en: Oh, no, I wouldn't want to mess you up.
Please.
What I do is I think of my hips turning on an axis.
translation.es: Yo pienso que mis caderas giran sobre un eje.

translation.en: So when you go to start your turn…
…you stay in the plié longer.
translation.es: te quedas más tiempo en el plié.

translation.en: That way you're halfway into your turn before you're up.
translation.es: Estás a medio camino antes de subir.

translation.en: So it's a cheat?
Call it a dance hack.
Good, but stay in the plié longer.
translation.es: Bien, pero quédate más en el plié.

translation.en: Now you're dancing like a Whitlaw.
That was supposed to be a compliment, Miss Thing.
Know what it's like having a sister who just made principal dancer?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que es tener una hermana primera bailarina?

translation.en: Everybody thinks that's why you got accepted here.
translation.es: Todos creen que entraste aquí por eso.

translation.en: Exactly.
I think it was your parents' money that got you in.
translation.es: Para mí, fue por el dinero de tus padres.

translation.en: Which is why at crack of dawn…
I'm here.
♪ It's all up in the air now ♪
♪ Oh, let me go ♪ [vocalizing] ♪ Don't ♪
translation.es: REGALIZ - MAL DÍA DE ATRACÓN - PURGA

translation.en: [Topher] Partnering. It is about working together,
translation.es: Tener un compañero se trata de trabajar juntos,

translation.en: but it's also about…
opposition.
About finding a language of reach and response.
translation.es: De encontrar un lenguaje de contacto y respuesta.

translation.en: A partner doesn't have to be a friend.
translation.es: Un compañero no tiene que ser mi amigo.

translation.en: Nureyev was 20 years younger than Fonteyn.
translation.es: Nureyev era 20 años menor que Fonteyn.

translation.en: Hallberg and Osipova, they did not even speak the same language.
translation.es: Hallberg y Osipova no hablaban el mismo idioma.

translation.en: But through the dance, you will find a bond,
translation.es: Pero, a través de la danza, establecerán un vínculo

translation.en: or you will die trying.
Sarah, you will dance with Kirill.
Gwen, you'll dance with Josh.
Lily, you'll be with Evgeni.
-Emily with Lucas. Esmé with Caleb. -[students murmuring]
translation.es: - Emily, con Lucas. - Sí. Esme, con Caleb.

translation.en: Neveah with Oren.
June, you'll dance with Nabil,
and, Bette, you will be with Shane.
Wait, I'm with Nabil? [gasps]
-Hey, Nabil. -Mr. Brooks, aren't I paired with Nabil?
translation.es: - Hola, Nabil. - ¿No soy yo la pareja de Nabil?

translation.en: Ballet is ever-changing, Miss Whitlaw.
I just think I'm better off with him.
He's taller, je parle français, and he's, you know, my level.
translation.es: Es más alto, je parle français, y tiene mi nivel.

translation.en: Shane is a fine dancer, quite capable of partnering you. Or…
translation.es: Shane es un buen bailarín y está a tu altura.

translation.en: do you question me? Of course not.
Thank you, sir.
Try to contain your enthusiasm.
You better fucking dance.
-[classical music playing] -[Topher] Let us begin. And that's right.
Piqué into fifth.
Tombé straight from that attitude, no hesitation.
translation.es: Tombé directamente desde el attitude. Sin vacilar.

translation.en: -Turn out those petit battements, ladies. -[phone vibrates]
-Everything okay? -Just a message from an old friend.
translation.es: QUE NO VUELVAS A PARÍS. - ¿Todo bien? - Sí, es un viejo amigo.

translation.en: [Topher] No one needs to see that transition en face!
translation.es: No queremos ver esa transición en face.

translation.en: Nabil, nice elevation on that lift.
Evgeni, get her further over her leg.
Bette, no, it's straight into passé relevé. There's no extra pas de bourrée. Stop cheating.
translation.es: No, Bette, vas directo a passé relevé. Sin pas de bourrée. No hagas trampa.

translation.en: Hold my hips, not my waist.
translation.es: Tómame de la cadera, no la cintura.

translation.en: The transition from the pirouette into the attitude is late.
translation.es: Más rápido el pasaje del giro al attitude.

translation.en: You need to get the leg out and lift under the thigh.
translation.es: Extiende la pierna y levanta la zona del muslo.

translation.en: Well, I can't if he won't put me on my leg.
translation.es: No puedo si él no me coloca bien.

translation.en: That's not the problem. You need to spot faster,
translation.es: No es el problema. Gira la cabeza antes, anticipa el arabesque y sube a la punta.

translation.en: anticipate the arabesque, and get over your box.
translation.es: Gira la cabeza antes, anticipa el arabesque y sube a la punta.

translation.en: -But if Shane-- -[Topher] Enough! I didn't correct Shane.
translation.es: - Pero Shane… - Basta. No corregí a Shane,

translation.en: I corrected you, again.
Show me the pirouette.
No, that's not working.
Let's try another section.
I can't look at this anymore.
Take it from the corner into the jetées.
translation.es: Vayan al rincón, veamos los jetés.

translation.en: -[classical music playing] -Come on, girl, you got this.
[Topher] Shane, faster hands. Bette, find your center.
translation.es: Shane, rápido las manos. Bette, busca tu centro.

translation.en: Close your ribs and up, up, go up!
-[grunts] -[gasps] Lordy fuck, are you okay?
-[Bette] I'm fine. -Are you sure?
-[music stops] -Yes.
Yeah.
Let's do it again.
I'll spare you.
If you don't properly prepare for a lift, it will never work.
translation.es: Si no se preparan bien para la levantada, nunca saldrá.

translation.en: If your timing isn't in sync,
you need to find a way to save it, to adapt.
translation.es: deben encontrar la forma de adaptarse al tiempo del otro.

translation.en: Has anyone been paying attention?
We have.
Well, all right, then. Show me the second half.
translation.es: Muy bien. Muéstrenme la segunda parte.

translation.en: We can go now.
More extension on that cambré.
Thank you.
We'll continue tomorrow.
[Ramon] Tomorrow's spoken for.
Tomorrow we begin auditions.
The rep this term is no longer The Sleeping Beauty.
translation.es: Ya no harán La bella durmiente.

translation.en: Tomorrow, I work on a new ballet.
No Sleeping Beauty?
That little bitch.
We'll create a ballet of passion and darkness on the edge of desire.
translation.es: Crearemos un ballet de pasión y oscuridad próximas al deseo.

translation.en: We tell the story…
of Jack the Ripper.
The sex maniac who killed those women, like, a hundred years ago?
translation.es: ¿El depravado que mataba mujeres hace 100 años?

translation.en: We'll find something more appropriate.
What could be better?
We live in a dark, twisted world full of loss, lies, and brutality.
translation.es: Vivimos en un mundo oscuro lleno de pérdidas, mentiras y crueldad.

translation.en: you have your ballet.
Auditions tomorrow. Go.
You know we have our favorites.
translation.es: Sabes que tenemos a nuestros favoritos.

translation.en: And so do I.
-June. -You were right.
I can't stop thinking about Cassie.
translation.es: No dejo de pensar en Cassie.

translation.en: The thing is, she wasn't alone on the roof.
translation.es: Ella no estaba sola en la azotea.

translation.en: And Madame DuBois knows it.
There was a secret party with every tier-three student but me.
translation.es: Todos estaban en una fiesta secreta, excepto yo.

translation.en: I was in my room where I was supposed to be.
translation.es: Estaba en mi cuarto, como debía.

translation.en: They all told me they were tucked in. If you see or hear anything--
translation.es: Dijeron que estaban acostados. Si ves o oyes algo…

translation.en: There won't be.
I won't be here much longer.
Got you some ice.
Don't need it.
[scoffs] Just chill.
Literally.
You were right.
Good. Feels better?
I mean about us dancing together this year.
translation.es: Me refería a que bailáramos juntos este año.

translation.en: My parents could pull some strings.
No, you were right.
It's better we don't mix dance and our relationship.
translation.es: No mezclemos la danza con lo nuestro.

translation.en: Because you had one good pas de deux and some easy choreography?
It wasn't easy for you.
translation.es: A ti no te resultó fácil.

translation.en: [Bette] It would be if we were partners.
translation.es: Me resultaría fácil si bailáramos juntos.

translation.en: Shane doesn't know how to handle me.
And plus, you know she's the reason I fell.
translation.es: Y me caí por culpa de ella.

translation.en: She was pushing me this morning, making me do too much.
Right. It was Neveah's fault or Shane's or Brooks'.
translation.es: Claro. Fue la culpa de Neveah, o la de Shane, o la de Brooks.

translation.en: But you were the one who fell, Bette.
Petit rat.
[Cassie] When you make that leap, you fly alone.
It can help if there are others onstage with you,
translation.es: Te ayuda que otros te acompañen en el escenario,

translation.en: that corps de ballet.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] They're the company's lowest, the corps.
translation.es: Allí están los bailarines de menor jerarquía.

translation.en: [June sobbing] I'm so sorry.
[Cassie] The hungriest, most vulnerable.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] Only there's power in that hunger.
It drives you to take crazy risks,
translation.es: Te lleva a tomar riesgos inesperados,

translation.en: to do what it takes to stand out from the crowd.
translation.es: a hacer lo que sea necesario para destacarte.

translation.en: You risk too much,
fly too high…
-[screams] -…and you could end up like me,
in this bed,
clinging to life.
[Cassie] In the corps, your job is to fit in,
translation.es: En el cuerpo de baile, tu tarea es encajar,

translation.en: to be an invisible part of a larger body while others claim the spotlight.
translation.es: ser invisible mientras otros se llevan la atención.

translation.en: In French, "corps" means "body,"
or what you might call a corpse.
What all of us are fighting not to become.
translation.es: Lo que nadie quiere llegar a ser.

translation.en: It's that last turn nobody wants to make when you die…
translation.es: Es el último giro que nadie quiere dar cuando mueres…

translation.en: or when enough people see you that way.
translation.es: o cuando muchos te ven así.

translation.en: ♪ All the stars ♪ ♪ All the stars that come at night Don't compare ♪
♪ It's hanging on the wall While you're stumbling, stumbling ♪
